name: Glitter & Glow Liquid Eye Shadow
about: What it is:A brilliant long-wearing liquid glitter eyeshadow..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and phthalates..What Else You Need to Know:Glitter & Glow combines the perfect mix of pearl and glitter to lavish eyes with incredible luster. With its uniquely lightweight, water-infused texture, it glides on effortlessly, then dries down smoothly, locking in maximum sparkle with minimal fallout, for eyes with a real u201cwow!u201d factor.
ingredients: -Triethanolamine: Creates a barrier between your skin and the pearls to maximize comfort for barely-there wear...-Glycerin: Conditioning ingredient known to hydrate the skin.....Water, Mica (Ci 77019), Aluminum Calcium Sodium Silicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polyethylene Terephthalate, Squalane, Polysorbate 60, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, Triethanolamine, Carbomer, Silica. (+/-) Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Tin Oxide (Ci 77861).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply directly onto the desired eye area using the applicator wand. .-Wear it alone or over eyeshadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wanderlust can have my babies. I dont know what ms. stila put in these but im afraid she absolutely ate. I bought every shade. No fall out no fading no mess, just long wear gorgeous delicious glitter that doesnu2019t move all day. Anyway, new shades ASAP please and thank you<3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing compares. I have super oily skin/watery eyes and this stays literally all day on my inner corner. I've been using it for over 8 years and will continue to repurchase. The color is perfection and almost looks wet. Forever a holy grail for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way it just glides on my eyelids! The sparkle stays on forever!
